name: lz
content:
<!--zone_{ZONE}-->
  <WAREHOUSE LOCATION="<tkBookmark collection="perf" name="wpa"/>" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_Disk" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_System_Statistics" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />
  <HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_VM_Stats" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />
